title: Man Light Skin Tone Blond Hair
alsoKnownAs: Light Skin Tone Man With Blond Hair
description: A man with a light skin tone and blond hair. Represents a person with these specific features, or a general male figure.
apple_vendor_description: The man: light skin tone, blond hair emoji on Apple devices presents a friendly-looking individual with fair skin and bright, sun-kissed blond hair, styled with Apple's signature soft rounded edges. His facial expression, often a gentle smile, is rendered with subtle shading that adds to his approachable demeanor, enhanced by realistic lighting. This emoji on Apple devices is commonly used to represent a male person, a specific individual with blond hair, or to add a personal touch to messages about oneself or others.
